AvailabilityState.description: This variable reports current availability state for the Connector. Optional, because already reported in StatusNotification.

ChargeProtocol.description: The Charging Control Protocol applicable to a Connector. CHAdeMO: CHAdeMO protocol, ISO15118: ISO15118 V2G protocol (wired or wireless) as used with CCS, CPPWM: IEC61851-1 / SAE J1772  protocol (ELV DC & PWM signalling via Control Pilot wire), Uncontrolled: No charging power management applies (e.g. Schuko socket), Undetermined: Yet to be determined (e.g. before plugged in), Unknown: Not determinable, NOTE: ChargeProtocol is distinct from and orthogonal to connectorType.

ConnectorType.description: A value of ConnectorEnumType (See part 2) plus additionally: cGBT, cChaoJi, OppCharge. Specific type of connector, including sub-variant information. Note: Distinct and orthogonal to Charging Protocol, Power Type, Phases.

SupplyPhases.description: Number of alternating current phases connected/available.
